option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<RelativeLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent">
<!-- Thanh tiêu đề: Music App bên trái, Login bên phải -->
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvTitle" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_alignParentStart="true" android:layout_alignParentTop="true" android:layout_marginStart="2dp" android:layout_marginTop="49dp" android:padding="16dp" android:text="PN Music" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<!-- Banner dưới thanh tiêu đề -->
<Button android:id="@+id/btnLogin" android:layout_width="120dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:layout_alignTop="@id/tvTitle" android:layout_alignParentEnd="true" android:layout_marginTop="5dp" android:layout_marginEnd="22dp" android:text="Đăng nhập" app:backgroundTint="@null" android:background="@drawable/btn_gradient"/>
<ImageView android:id="@+id/imgBanner" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="200dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:src="@drawable/ic_backgrround" android:layout_below="@id/tvTitle" />
<!-- Container để load Fragment --> <FrameLayout android:id="@+id/fragmentContainer" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:layout_below="@id/imgBanner" android:layout_above="@id/bottomNav"/>
<!-- Thanh navigation dưới --> <com.google.android.material.bottomnavigation.BottomNavigationView android:id="@+id/bottomNav" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_alignParentBottom="true" android:layout_marginBottom="-10dp" app:menu="@menu/bottom_menu" />
</RelativeLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<RelativeLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent">
<!-- Thanh tiêu đề: Music App bên trái, Login bên phải -->
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvTitle" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_alignParentStart="true" android:layout_alignParentTop="true" android:layout_marginStart="2dp" android:layout_marginTop="49dp" android:padding="16dp" android:text="PN Music" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<!-- Banner dưới thanh tiêu đề -->
<Button android:id="@+id/btnLogin" android:layout_width="120dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:layout_alignTop="@id/tvTitle" android:layout_alignParentEnd="true" android:layout_marginTop="5dp" android:layout_marginEnd="22dp" android:text="Đăng nhập" app:backgroundTint="@null" android:background="@drawable/btn_gradient"/>
<ImageView android:id="@+id/imgBanner" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="200dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:src="@drawable/ic_backgrround" android:layout_below="@id/tvTitle" />
<!-- Container để load Fragment --> <FrameLayout android:id="@+id/fragmentContainer" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:layout_below="@id/imgBanner" android:layout_above="@id/bottomNav"/>
<!-- Thanh navigation dưới --> <com.google.android.material.bottomnavigation.BottomNavigationView android:id="@+id/bottomNav" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_alignParentBottom="true" android:layout_marginBottom="-10dp" app:menu="@menu/bottom_menu" />
</RelativeLayout>
